system.description:
You may select this talent instead of choosing a talent from your archetype, with the GM’s permission. This may be done during character creation, or later in play as part of character advancement.

You met the Outsider in a dream, and he branded you with his mark—a jagged symbol on the back of your left hand. You gain an additional personal truth, marked by the Outsider. In addition, you gain a selection of supernatural powers and enhancements which you are able to learn and use, as described in Chapter 7: Into the Void.
